title: Land for Sale in Gothatuwa
details:
Good Residential Property in Gothatuwa – Kolonnawa Angoda Road

Very peaceful and tranquil surrounding area & Good Neighborhood

Close to Supermarkets, Banks, Hospitals & School

20 feet wide road access

30 Mtrs to main Road (Kolonnawa Angoda Road)

800 mtrs to Kandy Road
2 Km to Kolonnawa Junction

10 Perch at 1.5 Million per Perch
Total Price Rs. 15 Million

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351, DUPLICATION ROAD, (next to Mahanama College)
COLOMBO 03
